title: Times of Day
description: Opening and closing times for a store or service.

xdm:opens.title: Opens
xdm:opens.description: Hour and minutes of the day in local time that the store or service opens. Format is hh:mm.

xdm:closes.title: Closes
xdm:closes.description: Hour and minutes of the day in local time that the store or service closes. Format is hh:mm.
